items.headline: A year after his death, Gene Hackman’s longtime Santa Fe home is listed for $6.25 million
items.summary_en: Actor Gene Hackman’s longtime New Mexico compound has hit the market, a year after he and his wife, Betsy Arakawa, were found dead inside the home.

items.headline: My mom, 90, has dementia. My brother wants her to buy a $500K property near his house. Does that make any sense?

items.headline: ‘I’m considering driving Lyft part time’: I’m 58 with a $1 million home. Do I finally give up work and enjoy life?
items.summary_en: “One thought is for me to stop working at age 60, while my wife continues for two more years at her teaching job.”
